message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm the one taking the biggest risk in this game!
You're taking a bigger share, but I'm still willing to negotiate!
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet!
I'm getting impatient, meet me in the middle or I'll take it all!
I'm not budging, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time!
Time's running out, meet my new terms or I'll walk away!
I'm not backing down, this is my final offer, take it or leave it!
This is my final offer, take it or we both walk away!
I'll take a smaller share now, but I'm not giving up yet!
Last chance, take it or we both walk away with nothing!
It's now or never, take it or we both lose!
